data.text: Adam go tamana o Seth, Seth go tamana o Enosh, Enosh go tamana o Canaan.
Canaan go tamana o Mahalalel, Mahalalel go tamana o Jared.
Jared go tamana o Enoch, dela nogo hai tamana o Methuselah. Methuselah go tamana o Lamech,
dela nogo hai tamana o Noah. Noah ana dama daane dogodolu go Shem, Ham, mo Japheth.
Nia dama daane a Japheth go Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech mo Tiras la go nia maadua mmaadua o nia daangada ala nogo daahi nia ingoo digaula.
Nia hagadili o Gomer la go digau Ashkenaz, Riphath mo Togarmah.
Nia hagadili o Javan la go digau Elishah, Spain, Cyprus mo Rhodes.
Nia dama daane a Ham go Cush, Egypt, Libya mo Canaan, la go nia maadua mmaadua o nia daangada ala e daahi nia ingoo digaula.
Nia hagadili o Cush la go digau Seba, Havilah, Sabtah, Raamah mo Sabteca. Nia hagadili o Raamah la aalaa go digau Sheba mo Dedan.
Cush dana dama daane dono ingoo go Nimrod, dela ne gila gaa hai tangada dauwa kaedahi mugi nua o henuailala.
Nia hagadili o Egypt la go digau Lydia, Anam, Lehab, Naphtuh,
Pathrus, Casluh mo Crete. Digau Philistia ne hagadili mai i digau Crete.
Nia dama daane a Canaan go Sidon, di ulumadua, mo Heth, nia maadua mmaadua o nia daangada ala e daahi nia ingoo meemaa.
Canaan la tamana madua labelaa o digau Jebus, digau Amor, digau Girgash,
digau Hivite, digau Arkite, digau Sinite,
digau Arvad, digau Zemar mo digau Hamath.
Nia dama daane a Shem la go Elam, Asshur, Arpachshad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether mo Meshek. Aalaa go nia maadua mmaadua o nia daangada ala e daahi nia ingoo digaula.
Arpachshad la go tamana o Shelah go tamana o Eber.

Eber ana dama daane dogolua: di ulumadua dono ingoo go Peleg1.19 Di ingoo Peleg i nnelekai Hebrew le e hai dono lee be telekai “waewae”, idimaa i di madagoaa nogo mouli iei mee, nia daangada henuailala gu waewae; di tama dela i golo dono ingoo go Joktan.
Nia hagadili o Joktan la aalaa go digau Almodad, Sheleph, Hazarmaveth, Jerah,
Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah,
Ebal, Abimael, Sheba,
Ophir, Havilah, mo Jobab.
Di hagatau gi muli di madahaanau mai i Shem gaa dau gi Abram le e hagatau beenei: Shem, Arpachshad, Shelah,
Eber, Peleg, Reu,
Serug, Nahor, Terah,
mo Abram (e haga ingoo labelaa bolo Abraham).
Abraham ana dama daane dogolua go Isaac mo Ishmael.
Nia dama daane a Ishmael guu hai nia dagi o nia hagadili adu dangada e madangaholu maa lua: Nebaioth go di ulumadua, Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad, Tema,
Jetur, Naphish, mo Kedemah.

Abraham gu iai dono lodo hege labelaa dono ingoo go Keturah, dela ne hai ana dama daane dogoono gi mee go Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak mo Shuah. Jokshan ana dama daane dogolua go Sheba mo Dedan.
Midian ana dama daane dogolima go Ephah, Epher, Hanoch, Abida mo Eldaah.
Tama daane Abraham go Isaac ana dama daane dogolua go Esau mo Jacob.
Nia dama daane a Esau la go Eliphaz, Reuel, Jeush, Jalam mo Korah.
Eliphaz guu hai tamana madua o nia hagabuulinga adu dangada aanei: go Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna mo Amalek.
Reuel guu hai tamana madua o nia hagabuulinga adu dangada o Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, mo Mizzah.
Digau matagidagi o Edom la ne hagadili mai nia dama daane a Seir aanei:
Nia king aanei nogo dagi tenua go Edom, nogo hagadau nia daangada gi muli i lodo di madagoaa nogo nia king i Israel ai:
Nia daangada o Edom gu waewae guu hai nia hagabuulinga dangada aanei: Timna, Alvah, Jetheth,
Oholibamah, Elah, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,
Magdiel, mo Iram.
